config.body_schema: { "type": "object", "properties": { "where": { "type": "object", "properties": { "kpiId": { "anyOf": [ { "maxLength": 50, "minLength": 0, "pattern": "^[\\w\\.\\-]*$", "type": "string", "description": "Marquee unique KPI identifier." }, { "maxItems": 2, "type": "array", "items": { "maxLength": 50, "minLength": 0, "pattern": "^[\\w\\.\\-]*$", "type": "string", "description": "Marquee unique KPI identifier." } } ] } }, "additionalProperties": false } }, "additionalProperties": false }
